q: is it bad for a man with blonde hair to use a mouthwash
pred: No, it is not bad for a man with blonde hair to use a mouthwash. In fact, it is a good practice for everyone to use mouthwash regularly to maintain oral hygiene and prevent bad breath. Mouthwash helps to remove plaque and bacteria from the mouth, which can lead to gum disease and tooth decay. However, it is essential to use mouthwash according to the instructions provided on the packaging and to avoid swallowing it.
